SELECT member_id, membername, nickname, phone, address, skill_rate, management_rate, sharing_rate, stop_day, created_at FROM member
del_flag IS NULL
AND membername LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY member_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

choose.when: UPDATE sharing SET del_flag = NOW() WHERE sharing_id = #{targetId} AND del_flag IS NULL
UPDATE question SET del_flag = NOW() WHERE question_id = #{targetId} AND del_flag IS NULL
UPDATE comment SET del_flag = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{targetId} AND del_flag IS NULL
UPDATE answer SET del_flag = NOW() WHERE answer_id = #{targetId} AND del_flag IS NULL
